meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Mauritania.
meanings.sent1: In Mauritania, you can buy many things with ougiyas.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for ougiyas at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The ougiyas in my pocket jingled as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a thousand ougiyas.
meanings.sent5: The shiny ougiyas sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: She counted the ougiyas in her purse.
meanings.sent2: The market was bustling with vendors selling ougiyas.
meanings.sent3: The children played with handfuls of colorful ougiyas.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the sound of clinking ougiyas.
meanings.sent5: The bag was heavy with the weight of countless ougiyas.
